data.title: John Adams

data.text:
This article is a stub. You can help the OverSimplified Wiki by expanding it with more information! (visual edit)

John Adams is the second president of the United States from 1797 to 1801.

Biography[]

John Adams was born in October 30, 1735. John was a leader during American Revolution. John Adams became president in 1797. He lost to his former friend Thomas Jefferson, then he retired to Massachusetts. John Adams died on July 4, 1826.

Appearances[]

The American Revolution (Part 1)

The American Revolution (Part 2)

The American Civil War (Part 1)

Prohibition (cameo)

The Pig War (cameo)

Trivia[]

John Adams makes an appearance in Prohibition as a statue.

John Adams really appreciates Ethan Allen and Horatio Gates' attack on fort Ticonderoga and Saratoga but Adams asked where has Benedict Arnold went since Adams sent him to do the Job but they didn't and Arnold causes to get an Ouch

He's the only Character that cared about Benedict Arnold so much since he mentioned Him and asked what happened to him
